entry.string: This script will install the Xaraya database and configure the settings you need to get started. This process will take approximately ten (10) minutes. If you need assistance at any point, visit the support forums or live IRC support for help.
entry.translation: Thees screept veell instell zee Xereya detebese-a und cunffeegoore-a zee setteengs yuoo need tu get sterted. Bork bork bork! Thees prucess veell teke-a eppruxeemetely tee (10) meenootes. Um gesh dee bork, bork! Iff yuoo need esseestunce-a et uny pueent, feesit zee sooppurt furooms oor leefe-a IRC sooppurt fur help.
